exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',
    'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',
    'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',
    'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',
    'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«',
    'æœ€æ–°','æœ€æ—§','æ”¶è—','æ–°æ¼«'
];
type = [
    '&area=2&sort=-1',
    '&area=2&sort=0',
    '&area=2&sort=1',
    '&area=2&sort=2',
    '&area=3&sort=-1',
    '&area=3&sort=0',
    '&area=3&sort=1',
    '&area=3&sort=2',
    '&area=4&sort=-1',
    '&area=4&sort=0',
    '&area=4&sort=1',
    '&area=4&sort=2',
    '&area=5&sort=-1',
    '&area=5&sort=0',
    '&area=5&sort=1',
    '&area=5&sort=2',
    '&area=6&sort=-1',
    '&area=6&sort=0',
    '&area=6&sort=1',
    '&area=6&sort=2',
    '&area=1&sort=-1',
    '&area=1&sort=0',
    '&area=1&sort=1',
    '&area=1&sort=2'
];
gender = [
    '-1',
    '1',
    '0',
    '2'
];
end = [
    '&end=0',
    '&end=2',
    '&end=1'
];
for (i in title) {
    Gender = `{{get('gender',Get('o'))}}`;
    End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
    Host = `{{Get('p')}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?gender=${Gender}${End}${type[i]}&img_host=${Host}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}

ruleBookInfo.name: name

ruleContent.content:
let domain = "."; function addOptions(url, options) { let headers = { Referer: baseUrl.replace(/,[\s\S]+\}/,"") }; if (!url.includes(domain)) { headers.Referer = ""; } options = options || {}; options.headers = Object.assign(options.headers || {}, headers); return options ? `${url},${JSON.stringify(options)}` : url; } function toImg(url, func, options) { let generateImgTag = (u) => ``; let generateHtml = (u, i, t) => typeof func == "function" ? generateImgTag(func(u, i, t)) : generateImgTag(u); return Array.isArray(url) ? url.map(generateHtml).join("\n") : generateHtml(url.toString()); } function load(urls) { for (i = 0; i < urls.length; i++) { let response = java.ajax(urls[i] + 'User_Activation.json'); if (JSON.stringify(response).includes("qyyuapi")){ return [response, urls[i]]; } } throw "Error: æ‰€æœ‰é“¾æ¥ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥"; } function parseKey(jsUrl) { let jsBaseUrls = [ "https://raw.githubusercontents.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator/main/", "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/xiaohan231/decodeObfuscator@main/" ]; let urls = [ "plugins/common.js", "plugins/manwa.js", "plugins/evalPacker.js", "tools/babel_asttool.js", "tools/config.js", "tools/decode.js", "tools/decodeOb.js", "tools/usefulPlugins.js", ]; let jsBaseUrl = cache.get("decodeObfuscator"); if (!jsBaseUrl || !java.ajax(jsBaseUrl)) { jsBaseUrl = load(jsBaseUrls)[1]; cache.put("decodeObfuscator", jsBaseUrl); } String.prototype.toAbsUrl = function() { return /^\.\/|^http|^content|^\/sdcard|^\/storage/.test(this) ? this : jsBaseUrl.concat(this); }; function loadJS(urls) { return jsBaseUrl && urls.map(url => script(java.importScript(url.toAbsUrl()))).join("\n") || ""; } function script(content) { return ``; } let html = `${loadJS(urls)}`; let key = JSON.parse(java.webView(html, Get('url'), "keys"))[0]; return key; } if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { let DEBUG = 0; let origin = Get('url'); let chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/); if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) { cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1])); } let imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) .select(".content-img") .toArray() .map(v => { let dataRsrc = v.attr("data-r-src"); return dataRsrc ? dataRsrc : ""; }) .filter(v => v !== ""); if (DEBUG) { imgs.splice(1); } var result = toImg(imgs, null, { headers: { origin: origin } }); result; } else { '
'; }

    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if(result.includes('html.js')){

    java.setContent(java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),"éªŒè¯").body());
}
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('.manga-list-2 li');
    var $ = element => String(list[i].select(element)[0].text());
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = $('.manga-list-2-title');
        intro = $('.manga-list-2-tip').replace(/å…è´¹.*/, '');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': '',
            'kind': '',
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': list[i].select('.manga-list-2-cover-img').attr('src') + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
            'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('.manga-list-2-cover a').attr('href') + '/?img_host=' + Get('p')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.manga-list-2 li')[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + '/search?keyword=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&img_host=' + Get('p') + '&page={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
